creator: mhilpert@gmx.de
text:
When recording samples through the JMeter proxy, JMeter creates for each sample 
a subnode "Browser-derived headers". How can i configure to avoid adding these 
subnodes? (so that they do not disturb a running test plan when these samples 
are added to a test plan.)

creator: mramshaw@alumni.concordia.ca
text:
I have already posted a fix for this bug (enhancement really). 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22721 ***
